video.title: Dark
video.synopsis: A missing child sets four families on a frantic hunt for answers as they unearth a mind-bending mystery that spans three generations.

episodes.synopsis: In 2019, a local boy's disappearance stokes fear in the residents of Winden, a small German town with a strange and tragic history.
episodes.title: Secrets

episodes.synopsis: When a grim discovery leaves the police baffled, Ulrich seeks a search warrant for the power plant. A mysterious stranger checks into the hotel.
episodes.title: Lies

episodes.synopsis: It's 1986, and Ulrich's brother, Mads, has been missing for a month. Confusion reigns as past and present intertwine.
episodes.title: Past and Present

episodes.synopsis: Bizarre occurrences give Charlotte a sense of déjà vu, and she suspects Peter is hiding something. Franziska snaps when Magnus confronts her.
episodes.title: Double Lives

episodes.synopsis: Hannah takes her obsession with Ulrich too far. The stranger asks Regina to deliver an important package. Martha is torn between Jonas and Bartosz.
episodes.title: Truths

episodes.synopsis: Ulrich looks to the past for answers and dredges up disturbing family secrets. Armed with new tools, Jonas probes the cave's murky depths.
episodes.title: Sic Mundus Creatus Est

episodes.synopsis: Ulrich questions a frail and frightened Helge in the nursing home. Jonas searches for Mikkel, but the stranger warns him about meddling with the past.
episodes.title: Crossroads

episodes.synopsis: In 1953, the disfigured bodies of two boys are exhumed at a construction site, the future location of Winden's nuclear power plant.
episodes.title: As You Sow, So You Shall Reap

episodes.synopsis: Ulrich runs afoul of the law, Helge tries to dodge Egon Tiedemann, Claudia harnesses the cave's powers, and Katharina lashes out at Hannah.
episodes.title: Everything Is Now

episodes.synopsis: Peter gets a shock. Jonas learns the truth about his family, but there are more surprises still to come. Helge makes a sacrifice.
episodes.title: Alpha and Omega

episodes.synopsis: Six months after the disappearances, the police form a task force. In 2052, Jonas learns that most of Winden perished in an apocalyptic event.
episodes.title: Beginnings and Endings

episodes.synopsis: Clausen and Charlotte interview Regina. The Stranger takes Hannah to 1987, where Claudia has an unnerving encounter and Egon visits an old nemesis.
episodes.title: Dark Matter

episodes.synopsis: In 1954, a missing Helge returns, but he'll only speak to Noah. In 1987, Claudia brings the time machine to Tannhaus, and Egon questions Ulrich again.
episodes.title: Ghosts

episodes.synopsis: Jonas meets an ominous figure. While the kids comb the cave for answers, the adults gather in the bunker to share what they know about the travelers.
episodes.title: The Travelers

episodes.synopsis: In 1987, Ulrich seizes an opportunity. The kids return to the cave with the time machine, and Jonas learns of a loophole that could change the future.
episodes.title: Lost and Found

episodes.synopsis: Armed with a plan to prevent the apocalypse, Jonas travels to 2019. During the Nielsens' anniversary party, Ulrich sneaks off with Hannah.
episodes.title: An Endless Cycle

episodes.synopsis: Martha meets the Stranger and learns his true identity. Claudia tries to prevent Egon's death in 1987. Hannah travels to 1954 to see Ulrich.
episodes.title: The White Devil

episodes.synopsis: On the day of the apocalypse, Clausen executes a search warrant at the power plant as Jonas and Claudia use the time machine to connect past and future.
episodes.title: Endings and Beginnings

episodes.synopsis: In 2019, Jonas emerges from the cave into a strange but familiar world: the town of Winden, reeling from the recent disappearance of a young boy.
episodes.title: Deja-vu

episodes.synopsis: Martha travels to 1888 to warn her friends about the 2020 disaster. Winden residents past and present search for their missing loved ones.
episodes.title: The Survivors

episodes.synopsis: Charlotte and Ulrich try to piece together what happened in the bunker. In different times and worlds, Jonas and Martha work to gain each other's trust.
episodes.title: Adam and Eva

episodes.synopsis: Martha and Jonas travel to 2052 and get a glimpse of a grim future. In 1954, two residents of Winden go missing, and Hannah receives surprising news.
episodes.title: The Origin

episodes.synopsis: In 2020, a visitor delivers a warning to Claudia. The day before the apocalypse, Jonas begins to question Eva's motives.
episodes.title: Life and Death

episodes.synopsis: Adam holds Martha captive. On the day of the apocalypse, an increasingly frantic Martha begs Bartosz for his help.
episodes.title: Light and Shadow

episodes.synopsis: Across three centuries, Winden's residents continue their desperate quest to alter their fate and save their loved ones.
episodes.title: Between the Time

episodes.synopsis: Claudia reveals to Adam how everything is connected — and how he can destroy the knot.
episodes.title: The Paradise
